ygData.subject: Re: NEW SPELL
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard something about it being a bit bugged, and for it to work properly it must be in your first spell slot.  Then you suck your target s AC. Still, what s
ygData.messageBody:
I heard something about it being a bit bugged, and for it to work properly
it must be in your first spell slot. Then you suck your target's AC.
Still, what's 6 AC really gonna do?

-----Original Message-----
From: TkAdam@... <TkAdam@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 8:15 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] NEW SPELL


>From: TkAdam@...
>
>In a message dated 6/1/99 8:58:10 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
>mata_eq@... writes:
>
>> Hey during the patch about a week ago I saw that "A new necromancer spell
>.. .
>> was added"
>>
>> I think it was called Something Vortex . . . anyone know what lvl it
is
>> or its effects?
>>
>>
>> -Skel the Gnome
>> Eci
>
>I have seen nothing useful. I found someone willing to "duel" with me. I
>cast it on her... and she lost 6 AC... and I lost 6 AC. That was the only
>noticeable effect. (and that was not a mistake... we BOTH lost AC...)
>
>Sonoroud Tomebinder.
>
